title: Enable running program with command line arguments
body: Current way of receiving parameters interactively is not convenient for automatic execution, especially not in workflows with other tools. Please add all necessary parameters as command line arguments.  All bioinformatics tools are written in that way. I personally recommend docopt.org.

title: Add resource files (VCF, pileup) in separate data directory
Move testing code to functions to new module (.py file)
--vch exist as parameter but VCF path is read from constant?!
body: Please answer for all issues how it is solved and allow issue's submitter to close it.

title: Existence of tests should not be visible inside variant_calling module
body: The tests should call (test) functions from variant_calling.py module and the module itself.

title: Input to variant_calling should be pileup file
body:
What do you get with -v what with -vch?
It is really hard for me to understand to flow of the code.
Can you make it more understandable and user friendly?
